column4: fiddling with alsa mixer I sometimes get sound... when toggling mute/unmute i can get sound... another mute/unmute its not there anymore
I have had some strange issues as well with sound on both 12.04 and 12.10 although much stranger on 12.10.. you might also want to go to the #alsa and  #pusleaudio   channels
